metadata.title: CVE-2012-3291 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in OpenConnect 3.18 allows remote servers tocause a denial of service via a crafted greeting banner.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect5 - 3.20-2
openconnect - 3.20-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openconnect package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20-2').
